tuv.seg: In June 2012, the European Council decided to create a banking union that would allow for centralised supervision and resolution for banks in the euro area
I Meitheamh 2012, rinne an Coimisiún Eorpach an cinneadh chun aontas baincéireachta a chruthú a cheadódh maoirseacht agus réiteach láraithe a dhéanamh do bhainc i limistéar an euro
The intention was to ensure that banks are stronger and better supervised and, should problems arise in the financial sector, they can be resolved more easily and without using taxpayers' money

B’éard a bhí ar intinn a dhéanamh ná a chinntiú go bhfuil bainc níos treise agus go ndéantar maoirseacht níos fearr orthu agus, sa chás go dtagann fadhbanna chun solais san earnáil airgeadais, is féidir iad a réiteach níos fusa agus gan airgead cáiníocóirí a úsáid

The banking union (pdf) is made up of a Single Supervisory Mechanism and a Single Resolution Mechanism, both of which are mandatory for all euro area member states and open to all other countries in the EU

Is éard atá san aontas baincéireacht (pdf) ná Sásra Maoirseachta Aonair agus Sásra Réitigh Aonair, a bhfuil an dá cheann díobh éigeantach do gach ballstát de limistéar an euro agus atá oscailte do gach tír eile san AE
There is also a set of common rules for banks in all EU member states, known as the single rulebook
Anuas air sin, tá sraith rialacha coiteanna ann do bhainc i ngach ballstát an AE, ar a dtugtar an leabhar rialacha aonair
The Single Supervisory Mechanism (SSM) became operational in November 2014
Rinneadh sásra oibríochtúil den Sásra Maoirseachta Aonair (SMA) i Samhain 2014
Under the SSM, the European Central Bank (ECB) is the banking supervisor for all banks in the euro area and is directly responsible for supervising the approximately 123 largest banking groups

Faoin SMA, is é an Banc Ceannais Eorpach (BCE) an maoirseoir baincéireachta do gach banc i limistéar an euro agus tá siad freagrach go díreach as maoirseacht a dhéanamh ar na tuairim is 123 grúpa baincéireachta is mó dá bhfuil ann
The national supervisors, such as the Central Bank of Ireland, continue to monitor the remaining banks
Leanann na maoirseoirí náisiúnta, ar nós Bhanc Ceannais na hÉireann, le monatóireacht a dhéanamh ar na bainc eile
The main tasks of the ECB and the national supervisors, working closely together, are to check that banks comply with the EU banking rules and to tackle problems early on

Is iad príomhthascanna an BCE agus na maoirseoirí náisiúnta, a oibríonn go dlúth lena chéile, a sheiceáil go gcomhlíonann na bainc rialacha baincéireachta an AE agus go dtéann siad i ngleic le fadhbanna a luaithe is féidir

While the role of the SSM is to make bank failures less likely, the role of the Single Resolution Mechanism (SRM) is to ensure an orderly resolution of failing banks with minimal costs for taxpayers and to the real economy

Cé gurb ionann ról an SMA chun an dóchúlacht a laghdú go dteipfidh ar bhainc, is é ról an tSásra Réitigh Aonair (SRA) réiteach ordúil banc a bhfuil ag teip orthu a chinntiú agus a chinntiú nach mbíonn ar cháiníocóirí agus an fíorgheilleagar íoc as costais íosta
The SRM covers banks overseen by the SSM
Cuimsíonn an SRA bainc atá faoi mhaoirsiú an SMA
It has been operational since the beginning of 2015 and will be fully operational (with a complete set of resolution powers) from January 2016
Tá an SRA oibríochtúil ó thús 2015 agus beidh sé go hiomlán oibríochtúil (le sraith iomlán cumhachtaí) ó Eanáir 2016
The SRM is made up of a board, the Single Resolution Board and a fund, the Single Resolution Fund
Tá bord, an Bord Réitigh Aonair agus ciste, an Ciste Réitigh Aonair san SRA

Once informed by the ECB that a bank is in trouble, the Single Resolution Board (SRB) is responsible for taking most decisions on the best course of action and preparing for the resolution of the failing bank

A luaithe a chuireann an BCE in iúl go bhfuil banc i dtrioblóid, tá an an Bord Réitigh Aonair (BRA) freagrach as formhór na gcinntí a dhéanamh ar an gcúrsa gnímh is fearr agus ullmhú a dhéanamh do réiteach an bhainc a bhfuil ag teip air
The Board is also responsible for managing the Single Resolution Fund
Tá an Bord freagrach, chomh maith, as an gCiste Réitigh Aonair a bhainistiú
The Single Resolution Fund (SRF) is financed by all the banks in the banking union countries
Déanann gach banc i dtíortha an aontais bhaincéireachta an Ciste Réitigh Aonair (CRA) a mhaoiniú
For situations when the SRF is not sufficiently funded by the banking sector, a backstop will be developed, which will facilitate borrowing by the SRF
I gcásanna nach ndéanann an earnáil bhaincéireachta an CRA a chistiú go leordhóthanach, forbrófar cúlstop, a éascóidh iasachtú ag an CRA
The euro area banking sector will ultimately be liable for the SRF repayments by means of levies
Beidh earnáil bhaincéireachta limistéar an euro faoi dhliteanas, faoi dheoidh, as aisíocaíochtaí an CRA trí thobhaigh a íoc
Both the supervisory and resolution mechanisms are underpinned by a set of common rules known as the single rulebook
Tá sraith rialacha coiteanna ar a dtugtar an leabhar rialacha aonair mar bhonn agus taca leis na meicníochtaí maoirseachta agus réitigh araon
The single rulebook is the foundation of the banking union
Is é bunchloch an aontais bhaincéireachta an leabhar rialacha aonair
It consists of a set of legislative texts that all financial institutions in the EU must comply with
Sraith téacsanna reachtaíochta atá ann nach mór do gach institiúid airgeadais san AE cloí leo
These rules, among other things, lay down capital requirements for banks, ensure better protection for depositors, and regulate the prevention and management of bank failures
Leagann na rialacha, i measc rudaí eile, ceanglais chaipitil do bhainc, cinntíonn siad cosaint níos fearr do thaisceoirí, agus rialaíonn siad cosc agus bainistiú teipeanna ar bhainc
